# The `AppendingBinaryByteStream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystream">WritableBinaryStream</a> which can write at its end causing the underlying data to grow. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystream">WritableBinaryStream</a> which can write at its end causing the underlying data to grow.

This class owns the underlying data.

Definition at line 134 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h">BinaryByteStream.h</a>.

### writeBytes() {#a5da8fa1c8cd50b1cccfb561b40d88532}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::AppendingBinaryByteStream::writeBytes (uint64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Attempt to write the given bytes into the stream at the desired offset.

This will always necessitate a copy. Cannot shrink or grow the stream, only writes into existing allocated space.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h/#l00170">170</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h">BinaryByteStream.h</a>.
